title: Revamp AMS Digital Agency site UI/UX to match SEO Sherpa style

requirements.text: Revamp the frontend UI/UX to closely match the visual style and interaction patterns of https://seosherpa.com/ while keeping the branding/content of https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/. Focus on layout, spacing, typography, component styling, and section structure; do not introduce unrelated product features.

quotes: REVAMP WEBSITE UI UX FOR https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/ KEEPING UI UX SIMILAR TO https://seosherpa.com/

acceptanceCriteria: Primary pages/sections follow an SEO Sherpa-like structure (e.g., clear top navigation, prominent hero, service/value sections, proof/metrics/testimonials, process, CTA blocks, footer) while using AMS Digital Agency content/branding.
Consistent design system is applied (type scale, spacing scale, button/link styles, card styles, section padding) across all pages/sections.
All user-facing text is in English.
Responsive layouts are implemented for mobile, tablet, and desktop with no overflow/layout breakage on common breakpoints.
Navigation and CTAs are clearly styled and accessible (visible hover/focus states, keyboard navigable).

requirements.text: Implement SEO Sherpa-like UX details: sticky/clear header behavior, strong visual hierarchy, reusable section components, and polished micro-interactions (hover states, subtle transitions) using the existing React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui approach (compose components without editing any immutable UI component source files).

quotes: KEEPING UI UX SIMILAR TO https://seosherpa.com/

acceptanceCriteria: Header/navigation behavior and styling feels comparable to SEO Sherpa (clean, prominent CTAs, consistent spacing, optional sticky behavior if appropriate).
Buttons, links, and cards have consistent hover/active/focus states and use subtle transitions (no jarring animations).
All new UI is built by composing existing UI components; no changes are required in immutable paths under frontend/src/components/ui or listed immutable hook/main files.

requirements.text: Ensure basic quality baselines for the revamped marketing site: accessibility, performance, and SEO-friendly markup.
acceptanceCriteria: All images include appropriate alt text; headings follow a logical hierarchy (H1 once per page, then H2/H3).
Color contrast is readable for primary text on backgrounds; interactive elements have visible focus indicators.
Pages avoid unnecessary heavy assets/animations; layout remains stable (no major cumulative layout shifts during load).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (compose them instead).
Stay within the pre-injected React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui + React Query template and single-actor Motoko backend constraints.
nonGoals: Rebuilding or scraping the live contents of https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/ automatically.
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Adding real-time features (WebSockets) or third-party email/SMS integrations.
Changing backend data models unless required for the UI/UX revamp.
